title: Phase transition properties: Normal melting temperature

components.name: 1-butylpyridinium bis[(trifluoromethyl)sulfonyl]imide
sample: 99 mol %;0.004 water mass %(dried by vacuum heating)

ref.full: Tokuda, H.; Tsuzuki, S.; Susan, M. A. B. H.; Hayamizu, K.; Watanabe, M. (2006) J. Phys. Chem. B 110(39), 19593-19600.
ref.title: How Ionic Are Room-Temperature Ionic Liquids? An Indicator of the Physicochemical Properties
